Settings-descriptions.inspection: Enable WCA inspection time before starting the solve
Settings-descriptions.inspection-time: Set the duration of inspection time in milliseconds (5000-60000ms)
Settings-descriptions.start-cue: Show a visual cue when the timer is ready to start
Settings-descriptions.hold-to-start: Require holding the spacebar before starting the timer
Settings-descriptions.hold-to-start-time: Set how long to hold the spacebar before starting (300-1000ms)
Settings-descriptions.manual-mode: Enable manual time entry instead of using the timer
Settings-descriptions.decimal-places: Set the number of decimal places to display in times (1-4)
Settings-descriptions.scramble-image: Show a visual representation of the scramble
Settings-descriptions.session-stats: Display statistics for the current solving session
Settings-descriptions.quick-action-buttons: Show buttons for common actions like delete and DNF
Settings-descriptions.hide-while-solving: Hide the timer and UI elements while solving
Settings-descriptions.scramble-background: Show the scramble as a background element
Settings-descriptions.best-time-alert: Show an alert when you achieve a new best time
Settings-descriptions.best-average-alert: Show an alert when you achieve a new best average
Settings-descriptions.worst-time-alert: Show an alert when you get your worst time in a session
Settings-descriptions.new-personal-best-sound: Play a sound when you achieve a new personal best time
Settings-descriptions.custom-background-description: Upload a custom background image to personalize your timer (max 4MB)
Settings-descriptions.data-import-export: Backup your data to a file or restore from a previous backup
Settings-descriptions.auto-select-description: Automatically select a cube at application start
Settings-descriptions.language-description: Change the language used throughout the application

HomePage.title: Timer
HomePage.empty-scramble: Choose a cube to load a scramble.
HomePage.new_worst_time: Oops, you got your worst time!
HomePage.personal_best: You have beaten your previous personal best.
HomePage.start-stackmat: Start your Stackmat to start the timer

SolvesPage.title: Solves

dialogs.move-to-history-para: You will be able to access them by tapping the history switch.

toast.success-copy-description: Has been copied to your clipboard.

alert.title: Attention!
alert.empty-cubes: No cube selected. Please choose one.

SolvesPage.empty-solves-description: Tap the switch at the top of the screen to see your history.

StatsPage.title: Stats
StatsPage.global-tooltip: Combines all historical and session solves for every cube in the same category.
StatsPage.sessions-tooltip: Counts only session solves for every cube in the same category.
StatsPage.cube-all-tooltip: Combines all historical and session solves for only the selected cube.
StatsPage.cube-session-tooltip: Counts only session solves for only the selected cube.
StatsPage.empty-statistics-description: It looks like your solve vault is currently empty.

CubesPage.title: Cubes
CubesPage.no-cubes-description: Start adding cube collections to your vault to see them here.
CubesPage.name: Name

Cubes-modal.delete-collection-description: This cube collection will be deleted, along with all of its solves, records, and settings.
Cubes-modal.danger-msg: Modifying the collection category also changes the solves associated with that category.
Cubes-modal.name: Name
Cubes-modal.new-collection-description: Cube collections allow you to keep track of each cube's history without affecting overall category stats.

Settings-menu.allowed-file-types: Only image files (JPEG, PNG, GIF) are allowed.
Settings-menu.legend: NexusTimer is a minimalist, open-source web timer built for speedcubing.

backup-modal.title: Intelligent Backup Restoration
backup-modal.description: Let NexusTimer smartly import everything; it will automatically detect and recreate a compatible data structure.
backup-modal.alert-category: CSTimer and CubeDesk require manual adjustment of categories.
backup-modal.drag-drop: Drag and drop your files here, or click to select.
backup-modal.loading-part-1: This action takes less than a minute.
backup-modal.loading-part-2: Please wait, don't close this window.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.fetching-last-backup: Fetching information from the server, please wait...
SettingsPage.unlink-account-para1: Are you sure you want to unlink from the account
SettingsPage.unlink-account-para2: Unlinking will delete all data from this device.
SettingsPage.save-data-description: Do you want save your account data on the cloud?
SettingsPage.save-data-warning: This will overwrite previously saved data.
SettingsPage.load-data-description: Do you want to download your account data from the cloud?
SettingsPage.load-data-warning: This will merge current data with saved data.

TransferSolvesPage.title: Transfer Solves
TransferSolvesPage.failed-transfer: Failed to transfer solves. Please try again.
TransferSolvesPage.empty-vault: Your solve vault is currently empty.

Metadata.title: Nexus Timer - Professional Rubik's Cube Timer
Metadata.description: Nexus Timer is a professional platform for training and analyzing your journey with the Rubik's Cube.
